text:
@realDonaldTrump WRONG AGAIN.  WHY DO YOU MISLEAD AMERICA!

The US has performed FIVE coronavirus tests per MILLION people, compared with SOUTH KOREA’S 3,692 tests per MILLION people.
Business Insider
May 4, 2020
